Text:
Howdy... Just a quick note to say thanks.
I personally want to thank you VERY much for putting in the effort to...

-THEN removing the commercials
and THEN uploading it for everyone to enjoy.
Your efforts are appreciated by far more than tell you.
Cheers and thanks again
